timeline.bodyText: TableDescriptor and ColumnFamiltyDescriptor have a similar requirement, but provide a richer interface for interacting with their maps. Consider providing similar?
timeline.author: ndimiduk

replies.bodyText: You're right, it should be replaced with richer interface.I'll do it.
replies.author: ddupg

timeline.bodyText: Similar question about the interface allowing deeper access to the map.
timeline.author: ndimiduk
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -114,4 +115,12 @@ static RSGroupInfoManager create(MasterServices master) throws IOException {
    */
   void renameRSGroup(String oldName, String newName) throws IOException;
 
+  /**
+   * Update RSGroup configuration

timeline.message: HBASE-24431 RSGroupInfo add configuration map to store something extra

timeline.bodyText: We have a removeConfiguration so let's not allow null value here?
timeline.author: Apache9

replies.bodyText: The implementation still accepts null value?
replies.author: Apache9

replies.bodyText: Has thrown a exception when accepts null value, it isn't right? Also add a @NonNull annotation?
replies.author: ddupg

replies.bodyText: Oh, you can just use Objects.requireNonNull. I see there is still a null check so do not look closely the line inside the if...
